bibl.title: A Family of Letopolite Priests.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Stela of Anemher [London, British Museum Inv. EA 393; Saqqara, Serapeum of Memphis, 132 BC; hieroglyphic and Demotic]. - 3. Sarcophagus of Imhotep [Paris, Musée du Louvre Inv. D 12 (= N 248); Saqqara?, IVth cent. BC?]. - 4. Priest Imhotep. - 5. The family of Anemher. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Maxim Panov, A Family of Letopolite Priests.
Lingua Aegyptia 22 (2014) pp. 182-213, 1 arbre généalogique, 5 pll.
